name: is-mac-and-anti-malware
description: Matches Mac endpoints that have anti-malware software installed

name: is-win-and-anti-malware-1day
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have anti-malware software installed and a Last Scan Time and Virus Definition within 1 day

name: is-win-and-anti-malware-7days
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have anti-malware software installed and a Last Scan Time and Virus Definition within 7 days

name: is-win-and-anti-malware
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have anti-malware software installed

name: is-win-and-disk-backup-1day
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have disk backup software installed and a Last Backup Time within 1 day

name: is-win-and-disk-backup-7days
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have disk backup software installed and a Last Backup Time within 7 days

name: is-win-and-disk-backup
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have disk backup software installed

name: is-win-and-disk-encryption
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have disk encryption software installed

name: is-win-and-firewall
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have firewall software installed and enabled

name: is-win-and-patch-management
description: Matches Windows endpoints that have patch management software installed and enabled
